titles.title: We Are Feeding On The Living Bread

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are feeding on the living Bread; We are drinking at the Fountainhead, And whoso drinks there, Jesus said. Shall never, never thirst again. What, never thirst again? No, never thirst again! What, never thirst again? No, never thirst again! And whoso drinks there, Jesus said, Shall never, never thirst again!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are tasting of the living Wine, In spirit tasting life divine, And whoso tastes it, every time Shall have the joy of God. What, have the joy of God? Yes, have the joy of God! What, have the joy of God? Yes, have the joy of God! And whoso tastes it, every time Shall have the joy of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is the resurrected King Who died and rose, His life to bring; If you receive Him, you will sing And live forevermore. What, live forevermore? Yes, live forevermore! What, live forevermore? Yes, live forevermore! If you receive Him you will sing And live forevermore.{/lang-eng}
